name: id
description: 11 digit identifier, digits 1-3=Country Code, digits 4-8 represent the WMO id if the station is a WMO station. It is a WMO station if digits 9-11="000".

name: latitude
description: latitude of station in decimal degrees

name: longitude
description: longitude of station in decimal degrees

name: stnelev
description: the station elevation in meters. -999.0 = missing.

name: grelev
description: station elevation in meters estimated from gridded digital terrain data

name: popcls
description: population class (U=Urban (>50,000 persons); (S=Suburban (>=10,000 and <= 50,000 persons); (R=Rural (<10,000 persons)

name: popsiz
description: the population of the city or town the station is location in (expressed in thousands of persons).

name: topo
description: type of topography in the environment surrounding the station, (Flat-FL,Hilly-HI,Mountain Top-MT,Mountainous Valley-MV).

name: stveg
description: type of vegetation in environment of station if station is Rural and when it is indicated on the Operational Navigation Chart (Desert-DE,Forested-FO,Ice-IC,Marsh-MA).

name: stloc
description: indicates whether station is near lake or ocean (<= 30 km of ocean-CO, adjacent to a lake at least 25 square km-LA).

name: ocndis
description: distance to nearest ocean/lake from station (km).

name: airstn
description: airport station indicator (A=station at an airport).

name: towndis
description: distance from airport to center of associated city or town (km).

name: grveg
description: vegetation type at nearest 0.5 deg x 0.5 deg gridded data point of vegetation dataset (44 total classifications).

name: popcss
description: population class as determined by Satellite night lights (C=Urban, B=Suburban, A=Rural)
